channel.title: YOOOOOO OOOOOO OOOOOO on Hugo on Azure Demo
channel.description: Recent content in YOOOOOO OOOOOO OOOOOO on Hugo on Azure Demo

item.title: About me
item.description: Hey, I’m a cool kid! Here are some fun facts about me. I like electronics, Barbie dolls, video games, programming, art, perfume, afrofuturism, and knitting.

item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description: Welcome to my blog! It’s a Hugo site hosted on Azure with continuous deployment from GitHub. That means every time I update a .md file and commit the changes on GitHub, my blog will automatically update. Pretty cool, no?
